definitions.definition: Engaging in sexual activity with another person for pay .
examples: His addiction brought him to the point that prostitution was the only means he had to survive.

definitions.definition: Engaging in sexual activity with another person in exchange for goods (not necessarily money) or services .
Debasement for profit or impure motives.
examples: The television advertising job was a prostitution of the talents of one of the great writers of the century.

main_definition: Engaging in sexual activity with another person for pay .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Engaging in sexual activity with another person in exchange for goods (not necessarily money) or services .
( by extension ) Debasement for profit or impure motives.
